unnormalised: The monsoon had just started its gentle assault on Mumbai when Rakesh realized he'd completely spaced out on his taxes. It was already July 10th, 2024, and the deadline loomed like a dark cloud – July 31st, 2024. He'd been so caught up with his work as a software engineer at TCS, coding late nights and weekends, that the dreaded Form 16 and all its associated complexities had slipped his mind entirely.

unnormalised: Rakesh slumped onto his sofa, a half-finished cup of chai growing cold beside him. He knew procrastination was his weakness. He did not want a repeat of that stress.
